Wickham points out the confusion in the allegory. “ Hope and loyal friends are consolations of adversity, so that Horace must mean, not that they go with F ortune when she deserts a man, but that they cling to him, to his changed estate as to his unchanged. Yet is this is the case, in what sense is she said to be inimica?''
